title: Abakus That Much Closer to the Sun
description:
That Much Closer to the Sun is the name of Abakus' debut album, dated 2004 and released on the Liquid Sound Design label. The music can be described as downtempo or perhaps even ambient, edging to dub on certain tracks.

1.	Igamatik (5:48) 
2.	Shared Light (2:27) 
3.	Nightwalker (5:10) 
4.	Circles (6:39) 
5.	Magenta (3:57) 
6.	A Whole New Way Of Looking At The Day (3:32) 
7.	Indu (5:22) 
8.	California Sunshine (6:11) 
9.	Lux Boutique (2:29) 
10.	Drum Druid - Last Summer Dub (Abakus Remix) (4:42) 
11.	That Much Closer... (4:59) 




VBR 210 artwork included. As always please seed to a ration of at least 2 and leave a comment if you like this .............Enjoy!!
